re: CRY

NB for the lazies

tons of libraries already exist!

  • no-d3 stuff
    • Chart.js
    • Chartist.js
  • yes-d3 stuff
    • NVD3
    • C3 (charts! charts! charts!)
  • under construction
    • SugarCube
    • R2D3 (???)

re: CRY (cont'd)

another NB for the lazies

charting libraries can be constraining

  • aesthetics
  • functionality (adding callbacks, etc.)

(all the more reason to roll our own!!)

so let's do it!
